docs.title: Number Guessing Game in ReScript using React
docs.text: This project is a number guessing game written in ReScript language. It uses React to generate HTML code, Tailwind CSS to use beautiful CSS styles and Vite for web server templates. It supports levels that increase the maximum number to guess for higher levels.

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
Build ReScript first:

npm run res:build

Run ReScript in dev mode:

npm run res:dev

In another tab, run the Vite dev server:

npm run dev
